name: 填充缺失值
desc:
DataFrame products
+-------------+--------+
| Column Name | Type   |
+-------------+--------+
| name        | object |
| quantity    | int    |
| price       | int    |
+-------------+--------+

编写一个解决方案，在 quantity 列中将缺失的值填充为 0。

返回结果如下示例所示。

 

示例 1： 
输入：
+-----------------+----------+-------+
| name            | quantity | price |
+-----------------+----------+-------+
| Wristwatch      | 32       | 135   |
| WirelessEarbuds | None     | 821   |
| GolfClubs       | None     | 9319  |
| Printer         | 849      | 3051  |
+-----------------+----------+-------+
输出：
+-----------------+----------+-------+
| name            | quantity | price |
+-----------------+----------+-------+
| Wristwatch      | 32       | 135   |
| WirelessEarbuds | 0        | 821   |
| GolfClubs       | 0        | 9319  |
| Printer         | 849      | 3051  |
+-----------------+----------+-------+
解释：
Toaster 和 Headphones 的数量被填充为 0。

templates.defaultCode:
